page.title: 07part 3 PRIME MINISTER
page.content:
{TAKEN FROM THE LOCAL ADVERTISER } {14th FEBRUARY 1985 "IT HAS NEVER BEEN A TIME OF CALM. 'THE IRON LADY' HAS SHOWN HER STRENGTH,HITTING TORY PARTY VALUES AT THEIR HEART.BACK BENCH REVOLTS HAVE BECOME COMMONPLACE BUT THOSE WHO CROSS HER ARE IN FOR A FULL 13 ROUNDS."
"SHE HAS STOOD HER GROUND,WHETHER RIGHT OR WRONG,PROVED A FORMIDABLE OPPONENT EVEN TO IRA BOMBINGS AND PROVED THAT WOMEN CAN NOT ONLY MOVE UP IN THE WORLD THEY CAN GO RIGHT TO THE TOP."
{19th JUNE 1985 DARREN RYDE,10,SAYS "SHE LOOKS TOUGH ON TELEVISION,AND SHE'S A GOOD SPEAKER. SOMETIMES I LISTEN TO WHAT SHE SAYS BUT MOST OF THE TIME SHE TALKS ABOUT POLITICS".
